    const express = require("express");
const app = express();
const port = 3000;

// ë©”ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ì— ì ‘ì†í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ì½œë°±í•¨ìˆ˜ ì‹¤í–‰
app.get("/", (req, res) => {
  res.send("Hello World!");
});

// hi í˜ì´ì§€ì— ì ‘ì†í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ì½œë°±í•¨ìˆ˜ ì‹¤í–‰
app.get("/hi", (req, res) => {
  res.send("<h2>Hi!</h2>");
});

app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Example app listening at http://localhost:${port}`);
});

    Today I Learned
